short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to help you stay focused and productive while working.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
E2 Work Timer is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused and productive while working. Whether you're working on a project, studying, or just need to manage your time better, E2 Work Timer has got you covered.

Key Features
Custom Timers: Set custom timers for your work sessions to fit your unique schedule.

Playlist Management: Add and manage YouTube playlists to play during your work sessions, keeping you motivated and focused.

Notifications: Receive notifications before the end of a work session to help you wrap up your tasks.

Inspirational Quotes: Get daily inspirational quotes to keep you motivated throughout the day.

"E2 Work Timer Settings": This Special bookmark stores Custom timers, playlist preferences, and other personalized options allowing for easy backup and sync across devices. 

If you have any questions, feedback, or need support, please contact us at TheWorstCoded@pm.me.
